name: is_dir
purpose: Tells whether the filename is a directory

return.description:
Returns TRUE if the filename exists and is a directory, FALSE
   otherwise.

notes.description:
The results of this
function are cached. See clearstatcache for
more details.

As of PHP 5.0.0, this function
can also be used with some URL wrappers.  Refer to
 for a listing of which wrappers support
stat family of functionality.
